üìã Usage Instructions

After downloading, use these commands to load the Docker images into your local registry:

# Download the files (if not using the buttons above) wget "https://example.com/enterprise-server-{{TAG}}.tar.gz" -O enterprise-server-{{TAG}}.tar.gz wget "https://example.com/runtime-nikolaik-{{TAG}}.tar.gz" -O runtime-nikolaik-{{TAG}}.tar.gz wget "https://example.com/runtime-ubuntu-{{TAG}}.tar.gz" -O runtime-ubuntu-{{TAG}}.tar.gz # Load the Docker images into your local registry docker load < enterprise-server-{{TAG}}.tar.gz docker load < runtime-nikolaik-{{TAG}}.tar.gz docker load < runtime-ubuntu-{{TAG}}.tar.gz # Tag the images for your local registry docker tag ghcr.io/all-hands-ai/enterprise-server:{{TAG}} your-registry.com/enterprise-server:{{TAG}} docker tag ghcr.io/all-hands-ai/runtime:{{TAG}}-nikolaik your-registry.com/runtime:{{TAG}}-nikolaik docker tag ghcr.io/all-hands-ai/runtime:{{TAG}}-ubuntu your-registry.com/runtime:{{TAG}}-ubuntu # Push to your local registry docker push your-registry.com/enterprise-server:{{TAG}} docker push your-registry.com/runtime:{{TAG}}-nikolaik docker push your-registry.com/runtime:{{TAG}}-ubuntu
